title: "WeRide Wins Sanctions Against Rival In Trade Secrets Spat"
excerpt: "The companies are developing autonomous or self-driving cars for the Chinese market ... Wang was pushed out as CEO from WeRide in January 2018 after his former employer, the Chinese internet giant Baidu, sued him for allegedly failing to return a laptop belonging to Baidu, stealing Baidu's trade secrets and poaching Baidu's employees."
